author: Staff Reporter
text:
Election officials in the early hours of Thursday seized a lorry with container filled with footwear meant for free distribution to school students in Veppadai in Kumarapalayam Assembly constituency.

The lorry was parked along the road for the past four days. Though villagers had informed the flying squad team about the vehicle, election officials did not inspect it.

On Wednesday, around 11 p.m. villagers besieged the lorry and threatened to break the windows if the container was not opened.

Election officials rushed to the spot. At 1 a.m. on Thursday, officials opened the container and found the footwear worth around Rs. 36 lakh, packed in bags.

The driver informed officials that it was being transported from Haryana to Erode district.

With the driver not in possession of any documents, officials sealed the container and took the lorry to the tahsildar office in Komarapalayam.
title: Container load of footwear seized
